name: Frenzy (itch)
description:
Frenzy is a endless runner 3D game that I made for my college's project in Interactive Design and Game Development at Dhurakij Pundit University.

Story

A tiny fox has learnt a dark magic power, so that made he can gain and use dark powers. One day, he enter to mysterious forest for exploring new power, but this forest has many weird creatures and obstacles. Help him reach as deep as possible.

How to play :

  • Spacebar - Jump
  • F - Fireball
  • E - Frenzy form

Game Mechanic :

  • If a fox collides with obstacle, meat score decrease 90%. If meat score is 0, a fox dies.
  • You can transform to Frenzy form, when you get dark gem to 20 and press E button.

Assets :

  • https://gtibo.itch.io/hooded-fox
  • LowPoly Animated Monsters by quaternius (itch.io)
  • https://bit.ly/3oeGNNk
  • https://gualtierisgg.itch.io/low-poly-food
  • Low Poly RPG Bundle (Gold, Gems etc.) Part 1 by GualtierisGG (itch.io)
  • https://bit.ly/3pl6Y4l
  • https://bit.ly/3IbG8Ep

BGM :

  • Forest Walk – Alexander Nakarada
  • Last Boss : Let’s see what we got – Komiku
  • Boss 4 : Cobblestone in their face – Komiku
